text:
The foods are all very delicious at a very affordable pricing. The service is tip top, especially the Assist Manager Ken Lee is superb in his service. Will definitely come back again!! The chilies is a MUST EAT item.

Do rem to look for Manager Ken!! He is very friendly

my family and i come here every year to celebrate my grandmotherâ€™s birthday. we are never disappointed by the service and the quality of food. manager Ken Lee is fantastic- he always makes sure we are comfortable and satisfied. everything was delicious and we gave the desserts a try this time. light & not too sweet.
thank you so much, we appreciate the annual hospitality! ðŸ˜€

Absolutely amazing service, especially by Ken Lee. He was very attentive and prompt in his service. Overall very great dining experience and will definitely come again.

Recommended to also sign up for their membership to get 20% discount for Birthday Month.

Excellent customer service from service staff Ms Cheng Mei Sien.   When I told her the noodle was very peppery (which is their noodle speciality) she had offered me a glass of water.  For my birthday month, i was given  a 20% discount off the non promo set.  She even requested a free dessert, which was expied from my membership. The food was fantastic, and I did not regret returning back again.  Please keep up this improved standard since COVID time.

Came here for their lunch set. Loved the prawn dumplings as it was fully stuffed with prawns. It also came with side dishes which was not bad. Service was good despite being crowded. Overall not bad and will return again.
